text: Novosphingobium sediminicola is a Gram-negative, short rod-shaped, non-spore- forming and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Novosphingobium which has been isolated from freshwater sediments from the Lake Hakha in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Novosphingobium sediminicola at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2011 Category:Sphingomonadales
title: Novosphingobium sediminicola
